net.proteusframework.core.mail.support

Class MessageTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.mail.support.MessageTemplate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class MessageTemplate
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Represents a mail message template. Mail messages mail be incomplete, but are guaranteed to have at least the body set.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
